question: I live in Canada ,can I work in a call centre which book orders from customers to supply pizza , this pizza is mostly not halal for muslims.
answer:
QUESTION

I  live in Canada ,can I  work in a call centre which book orders from customers to supply pizza , this pizza is mostly not halal for muslims.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

It is permissible for you to work in a call centre. The nature of this work is to merely convey a message/order. That in itself is not prohibited.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
